  index: "sales",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      tags: {
        type: "keyword",
      },
      comments: {
        type: "nested",
        properties: {
          username: {
            type: "keyword",
          },
          comment: {
            type: "text",
          },
        },
      },
    },

});
